channel.title: Need Help on a Delta Source! 317!
channel.description:
hello, for who anybody who can hlp me fix this problem, i will give you my teamviewer id & pass
this is my problem
when i try running the server "runserver" CMD pop comes out
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
this is the "runserver" file --> @echo off cd bin java -Xmx800M Server pause

item.title: Need Help on a Delta Source! 317!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“AyrtonGold, post:1, topic:388484”]hello, for who anybody who can hlp me fix this problem i willpay 4$ in payal, i will give you my teamviewer id & pass

this is my problem

when i try running the server “runserver” CMD pop comes out

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

this is the “runserver” file -->
@echo off
cd bin
java -Xmx800M Server
pause[/quote]

It clearly says that it can’t find class Server in the current classpath. Depending on where the run.bat is compared to the class files, you’ll have to edit it. If you post a short hierarchy of your server structure, we might be able to help.

Read full topic
